title: 9.03m_v1.0-FAS
description:
9.03m_v1.0-FAS

9.03m v1.0 (c) Space Budgie

Date ..........: 2013-11-21 25 x 05.00 :......... Files
Language ......: English - :.... Protection

Ripped:
- Redistributables
- Company Logo Movies

Requirements:
- DirectX 9.0c (Jun 10) Redistributable
- Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile
- Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable

9.03m is a short, first person, art/empathy game for the PC, created by
Space Budgie. The game draws upon the disaster that affected many people in
Japan in 2011, the tsunami caused by the Tohoku earthquake. It aims to
remember those who passed away in the tsunami as individuals, as opposed to
numerical data often found in news articles.

Based on Baker Beach, in San Francisco, you must navigate the beach, picking
up objects that have washed ashore, in search of butterflies.

URL: http://www.spacebudgie.com
URL: http://www.desura.com/games/903m

- Unzip and unrar
- Run 'setup.bat' to extract game data
- Install required redistributables if necessary
- Play
